text: @AmyMek @MeJB2 Where’s @JustinTrudeau on this?  He said enough is enough & if people don’t follow #COVID19 #SelfIsolation laws set out that #citizens can/will be #arrested / #fined for breaking the law. Or does this law only apply to certain #Canadians? #onpoli #cdnpoli #COVIDIDIOT @fordnation
